mapper.insert: insert into trip(tripdate, writer, title, content) values(#{tripdate}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: select * from trip order by tno desc
mapper.update: update trip set hit=hit+1 where tno=#{tno}
mapper.select: select *from trip where tno in ((select tno from trip where tno <#{tno} order by tno desc limit 1), (select tno from trip where tno>#{tno} limit 1)) order by tno desc;
